body.name: Cailrr Retro Game Console – Classic Mini Retro Game System Built-in 620 Games and 2 Controllers, Old-School Gaming System for Adults and Kids，8-Bit Video Game System with Classic Games
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 34 mins
features: Unlock Childhood Memories: If you feel nostalgic about playing classic video games with your childhood friends,Cailrr is here to bring that era back! Our retro game console is like a throwback in time, offering you a wide range of classic games to bring back that childhood joy!

620 Preloaded Classic Games: This retro gaming system comes with 620 preloaded games, including all your favorites such as puzzles, action games, fighting, racing, sports game, and more that will keep you on your toes still to this day!

Fun Family Activity: Regardless of the age, a classic gaming experience is unrivaled by modern games! This entertainment system features 2 retro controllers, perfect to play with your childhood friends, family or show your kids who cool were the games back in the day!

Easy to Setup: Our old-school video game systems feature a classic 8-bit game console with a plug-and-play system that doesn’t require an internet connection or insert cards. The console is easy to connect to your smart or old TV via AV ports and ready to keep you entertained!

Great Gift Idea: Surprise your best friend, childhood friends, family or kids with a cool retro gaming console and be sure that you will make a lasting impression! It makes an excellent gift for a birthday, anniversary, Christmas, Father’s Day or other special occasions.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.5 3.5 out of 5 stars 41 ratings 3.5 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tales me back…
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t sure who I was buying this game system for but I knew I had to see what it was all about! I grew up on these old games and wanted to share them with the younger generation. I’ve seen these types of multiple game systems before and they were always a letdown with bad graphics and poor quality. This one was a winner! All my favorite old games and then some. Easy to hook up and the controllers were just as I remembered. Brought back great memories. Hours of family fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not really worth it.
reviews.reviewText: Gameplay is horrible. the games that are in there are repeated in the list. I've played it once since I've had it. I would have been better off of actually buying a Nintendo to play the old school games on

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lots of repeat games, and remote plays horribly
reviews.reviewText: Was super excited to get this little system couldn’t wait to play super Mario, tried to and it’s so difficult to play because the controller sometimes does what it wants. It’s like I hit the left controller to run and it literally gets stuck same with pac man. Was a little let down on the games I’d have to really go back and count but trust me when I say you are not getting over 620 different games I’m gonna keep it because I don’t want to deal with the hassle of returning it and I figured even if became a paper weight it would still be a cool one just to have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun and nostalgic
reviews.reviewText: Tried this, and boy it brings back memories. Fun playing the different games. The only downside is you can't save your progess in any of the games. It also didn't come with a list of games like it says it would.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Retro Gaming, Endless Family Fun!
reviews.reviewText: The Cailrr Retro Game Console is a wonderfully nostalgic product. With 620 classic games built-in, it not only brings back my childhood memories but also introduces my kids to the charm of classic 8-bit games. This console is compactly designed and easy to operate, making it perfect for family entertainment. We have spent many joyful hours playing games on this console. It's an excellent choice for those looking to relive their childhood or introduce their children to classic gaming.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Children’s New Games
reviews.reviewText: When I received the game console, the children immediately opened it to play. The quality of the game console is very good, and there are many games, when I get tired from work, I can also play for a while.On weekends, when I am bored at home, I can also pass the time. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Save your money
reviews.reviewText: Many of the games are duplicates and only the first level. Controllers don’t always work for the characters to go in the direction that you are intending.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and fun!
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to hook up on the tv and has so many fun games! 10/10 recommend! My son loved it
